channel.title: DeceptionX - Where legends are born! Join us today!
channel.description:
~DeceptionX come join us today!!!~ We are a 718 RSPS!!! Fullscreen client and all!!!
-Great ECO -All skills working 100% -Great staffs -Fight caves, fight kiln,fight pits, godwars, dominion tower, barrows are some of the many minigames! -We have QBD, KBD and Corp and even Nex! -There are loads of customs! (500+) and we're a 718! -Dungeoneering and construction works 100% !! -The customs bring an extra for pking and not like other server where the customs are over-powered -We have staffs that help others 24/7 and if it's not on the server, it's on skype! -There is also dicing which makes money-making easier or way harder! -Money-making is not too easier but it's not too hard so players want to stay on the server for a long time! -It's hosted 24/7 by a powerful vps! -Skilling is just flawless with all the different spots for each skills! -Players are very friendly :) ! -Client is working 100% ; Fullscreen and resizeable fully working! -Highscores are working 100% ! -Skilling for combat is a bit faster than other skills so you can start pk right away! -Daily minor website/client updates to fit just perfectly the players -Unique donator rights and a donator zone which is currently under construction but it'll be there when you'll come! -And much more! Come and see by yourself :)
http://wherelegendsareborn.wix.com/deceptionx

item.title: DeceptionX - Where legends are born! Join us today!
item.dc:creator: @DeceptionX DeceptionX
item.description:
@DeceptionX wrote:

                           ~DeceptionX come join us today!!!~ We are a 718 RSPS!!! Fullscreen client and all!!!

-Great ECO
-All skills working 100%
-Great staffs
-Fight caves, fight kiln,fight pits, godwars, dominion tower, barrows are
some of the many minigames!
-We have QBD, KBD and Corp and even Nex!
-There are loads of customs! (500+) and we’re a 718!
-Dungeoneering and construction works 100% !!
-The customs bring an extra for pking and not like other server where the customs are over-powered
-We have staffs that help others 24/7 and if it’s not on the server, it’s on skype!
-There is also dicing which makes money-making easier or way harder!
-Money-making is not too easier but it’s not too hard so players want to stay on the server for a long time!
-It’s hosted 24/7 by a powerful vps!
-Skilling is just flawless with all the different spots for each skills!
-Players are very friendly !
-Client is working 100% ; Fullscreen and resizeable fully working!
-Highscores are working 100% !
-Skilling for combat is a bit faster than other skills so you can start pk right away!
-Daily minor website/client updates to fit just perfectly the players
-Unique donator rights and a donator zone which is currently under construction but it’ll be there when you’ll come!
-And much more! Come and see by yourself

http://wherelegendsareborn.wix.com/deceptionx

Read full topic
